title: Enna Solla Pora Lyrics Venghai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer(s): Devi Sri Prasad, Hook Phrase Vocals: M.L.R. Karthikeyan
Song: Yenna Solla Pore 
Lyrics: Hari
Music : Devi Sri Prasad
Movie :Venghai

Unna mattum nenjukula, vachirika intha pulla
veenaga ivan manasa killatha
3 maasam 6 maasam kaathirikum paya pulla
neeyaga ivan manasa killatha
ne kollatha..ohh.. kollathe

[Enna solla pora ne enna solla pora
Eppa solla pora ne eppo solla pora ](2)

kathirupen kathirupen 6 maasam thaan
kan mulichu paduthirundha 3 maasam thaan
Ennamo nadakuthu, idhayam valikuthu 
Manasu thavikuthu,Unnnodaya vaarthaikaaga

Enna solla pora ne enna solla pora
Eppa solla pora ne eppo solla pora

Unna mattum nenjukula, vachirika intha pulla
veenaga ivan manasa killatha ..killatha
3 maasam 6 maasam kaathirikum paya pulla
neeyaga ivan manasa killatha.. killatha

Chinna pulla nesam ithu, Pacha pulla paasam ithu
Yen manasa thaakiyathu, Munnala Munnala
Jathi matham paakalaye, sammathatha kekalaye
kadhalunu aayiruchu, thannala thannala
nesama nesama, 
nenjukule naan azhuthen, unnodaya vaarthaikaaga

Enna solla pora ne enna solla pora
Eppa solla pora ne eppo solla pora
Unna mattum nenjukula, vachirika intha pulla...

oh..
vettaruva thookikittu, vetti paya polirunthen
Vekka pattu naan nadandhen unnala unnala
katma kamba tthukikittu, kandapadi na thirinjen
kattupattu nan nadandhen, pinnala un pinaala
puthusa puthusa, 
maariruken theriruken unnodaya paarvaiyala
Enna solla pora ne enna solla pora
Eppa solla pora ne eppo solla pora

Unna mattum nenjukula, vachirika intha pulla
veenaga ivan manasa killatha ..killatha
3 maasam 6 maasam kaathirikum paya pulla
neeyaga ivan manasa kollatha.. 
Ne kollatha.
